jobDescription: Do you have a passion for quality and innovation? If so, you'll be right at home at Centrify. We are always looking for talented, motivated individuals who would like to help us design, build, sell and support the next generation of integrated software solutions as we redefine security from a legacy static perimeter-based approach to protecting millions of scattered connections in a boundaryless hybrid enterprise!  Centrify is looking for a passionate and a highly motivated Software Development Intern to join the Mac team. In this position, you will get an opportunity to work on enterprise scale product design. We are looking for a self-starter who has a passion to learn and create great products.  Responsibilities: Contribute to various quality improvements in the productWrite automation testing softwareWork on front-end macOS applications Key Skills: Solid coding skillsExperience in Swift, Objective-C, pythonExperience with automation test casesExcellent analytical and troubleshooting skills Education/Experience: The candidate must be pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related major.Have taken at-least 1-2 courses in programming and data structures/algorithms. Centrify offers competitive salaries and an excellent benefits package, including medical, dental, vision and life insurance. We also provide an Employee Assistance Program, paid holidays, paid time off, flexible spending account, stock options, 401k, and more. This is just part of what made Centrify one of Glassdoor's \"Best Places to Work in 2016\"!  Centrify Corporation is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to providing a diversified work environment, free of discrimination and harassment.  For more information regarding our company, or to search for all available job openings, please visit our website at www.centrify.com.  Centrify does not accept unsolicited resumes from individual recruiters or third party recruiting agencies in response to job postings. No fee will be paid to third parties who submit unsolicited candidates directly to our hiring managers.
